name: Chaos Cubes
description:
This is a game made for da brackeys game jam 2021.2, e

Story : you, a green cube, have entered chaos-land, a weird land full of nonsense. can you escape?

Notice : this game was made with gamemaker, so it may not be good.

Credits :

Kawai Sprite - Original title melody, witch was remixed for this game.
